alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 16 at 7:40PM CDT until March 16 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Enchanted Oaks, or near Gun Barrel City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Malakoff, Eustace, Caney City and Purtis Creek State Park around 750 PM CDT. Forest Grove Reservoir around 755 PM CDT. Athens around 810 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Murchison, New York, Log Cabin, Crescent Heights and Payne Springs. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
